ad_text: Taylor Garbage Service Sponsored We are looking for an aggressive self-starter who has the ability to: ◾️ Safely operate a truck ◾️ Make all collections and deposits as scheduled to ensure effective and efficient service to all residences, businesses and facilities ◾️ Perform daily safety and maintenance checks ◾️ Collect garbage from residential buildings, businesses and other facilities We are seeking an individual with strong driving experience and the ability to get the job done! If you are the person we are looking for, you will enjoy: ◾️ Competitive salary ◾️ Full benefit package ◾️ 401(k) plan with matching ◾️ Bonuses & more! Minimum Requirements: ◾️ Valid New York State Commercial Driver’s License Class B and must be maintained throughout employment ◾️ Minimum two (2) years CDL truck driving experience ◾️ Medical certification must be maintained throughout employment If your background and experience align with these qualifications and you want to advance your career, please apply to join our team! FULL-TIME · VESTAL, NEW YORK CDL B Driver Apply now
